title: Phase 7: Polish and parity testing
description: Verify all CLI flags, output formats, error messages match Python. Performance benchmark vs Python. Test on real codebases (hygrep, omendb).

logs.msg: Overlaps with tk-zvga. Benchmark done: hhg search 2.5-4x faster than competitor, build 1.3x slower but indexes 5x more data (richer AST blocks + multi-vector tokens).
Python source/tests deleted. tests/golden/ fixtures kept for future Rust integration tests. Need assert_cmd tests.

14 integration tests using assert_cmd. Covers: build, search, status, clean, list, force rebuild, incremental update, JSON output, files-only, type filter, exit codes, camelCase matching, no-index error.
